fastvector package¶

Submodules¶

fastvector.vector module¶

Own implementation of a 2D vector class.

class fastvector.vector.Vector2D(x: SupportsFloat = 0, y: SupportsFloat = 0)[source]¶

Bases: object

Vector2D class to perform simple vector operations.

Callable for the vector instance to return its representation.

Checks if the self and vector2 are an instance of the Vector2D class.

__ge__(self, other, NotImplemented=NotImplemented)¶

Return a >= b. Computed by @total_ordering from (not a < b).

__gt__(self, other, NotImplemented=NotImplemented)¶

Return a > b. Computed by @total_ordering from (not a < b) and (a != b).

__hash__ = None¶
__init__(self, x: 'SupportsFloat' = 0, y: 'SupportsFloat' = 0)[source]¶

Creates a vector instance with the given x and y values.

Parameters
xnumber

x-Coordinate, by default 0

ynumber

y-Coordinate, by default 0

Raises
TypeError

If x or y are not a number.

__le__(self, other, NotImplemented=NotImplemented)¶

Return a <= b. Computed by @total_ordering from (a < b) or (a == b).
